thread.title: US investors return from Labor Day in a buying mood
thread.title_full: US investors return from Labor Day in a buying mood - San Francisco Chronicle

title: US investors return from Labor Day in a buying mood
text: Photo: Mark Lennihan, AP 8596577|article-6490166|7 8596577|article-6490166|1 email_share_embed|photo-8596577|article-6490166|1 8596577|article-6490166|2 8596577|article-6490166|3 8596577|article-6490166|4 8596577|article-6490166|5 google_share_embed|photo-8596577|article-6490166|6 FILE - This Jan. 4, 2010 file photo shows an entrance to a Wall Street subway station in New York. European stocks rose Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015 after a late rebound in Chinese markets and despite trade data showing headwinds for the global economy. FILE - This Jan. 4, 2010 file photo shows an entrance to a Wall... NEW YORK (AP) — U.S. stocks are opening solidly higher as traders come back from the Labor Day holiday. FILE - This Jan. 4, 2010 file photo shows an entrance to a Wall Street subway station in New York. European stocks rose Tuesday, Sept. 8, 2015 after a late rebound in Chinese markets and despite trade data showing headwinds for the global economy. FILE - This Jan. 4, 2010 file photo shows an entrance to a Wall... NEW YORK (AP) — U.S. stocks are opening solidly higher as traders come back from the Labor Day holiday.
